EmailTemplate.name: Co-Branding Partner Acknowledgment
EmailTemplate.subject: We have received your recent Co-Branded Collateral submission
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Co_Branding_Request__c.OwnerFullName},
We have received your Co-Branding request for literature, banners or other collateral from NCR. Your request will be submitted and if any additional details are required you will be contacted by one of the NCR Partner Network Program team members.
If you have any questions, please contact Partner Network Resource Center at partner.resourcecenter@ncr.com
Sincerely,
NCR Partner Network
NCR Confidential. For internal use by NCR and its authorized Solution Providers and Distributors only. NCR Corporation 864 Spring St NW, Atlanta, GA 30308-1007 Â©2019 NCR Corporation. All rights reserved. ncr.com NCR respects your privacy.
